content: The support Fe3O4@HKUST-1 was synthesized from a known procedure with modifications. Fe3O4@Cu2(OH)3NO3: A 1.5 mL solution of ammonium hydroxide and ethanol (VNH4OH:VEtOH = 1:5) was added to a mixture of Fe3O4 nanoparticles (0.26 g) and Cu­(NO3)2·3H2O (0.30 g) in 30 mL of EtOH. After stirring 24 h at 60 °C, the product was collected by filtration and washed with water/EtOH for ten times. Fe3O4@HKUST-1: Fe3O4@Cu2(OH)3NO3 (50 mg, dried under vacuum) was added to a solution of 5 mL of ethanol, 2 mL of H2O, and 55 mg of H3BTC; the mixture was stirred for 12 h at 60 °C. The product was isolated with a magnet and washed with water/EtOH for 10 times. Followed by drying at 120 °C overnight in a vacuum oven, the product was obtained as a black powder.
clean_text: The support Fe3O4@HKUST-1 was synthesized from a known procedure with modifications. Fe3O4@Cu2(OH)3NO3: A 1.5 mL solution of ammonium hydroxide and ethanol (VNH4OH:VEtOH = 1:5) was added to a mixture of Fe3O4 nanoparticles (0.26 g) and Cu(NO3)2⋅3H2O (0.30 g) in 30 mL of EtOH. After stirring 24 h at 60 °C, the product was collected by filtration and washed with water/EtOH for ten times. Fe3O4@HKUST-1: Fe3O4@Cu2(OH)3NO3 (50 mg, dried under vacuum) was added to a solution of 5 mL of ethanol, 2 mL of H2O, and 55 mg of H3BTC; the mixture was stirred for 12 h at 60 °C. The product was isolated with a magnet and washed with water/EtOH for 10 times. Followed by drying at 120 °C overnight in a vacuum oven, the product was obtained as a black powder.
